mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.url AS "url", a.ipaddress AS "ipaddress", a.addtine AS "addtine", a.edittime AS "edittime", a.slock AS "slock", a.servertype AS "servertype", a.status AS "status", a.rtmpsd AS "rtmpsd", a.rtmpnd AS "rtmpnd", a.rtmphd AS "rtmphd", a.rtmpvn AS "rtmpvn", a.m3u8sd AS "m3u8sd", a.m3u8nd AS "m3u8nd", a.m3u8hd AS "m3u8hd", a.m3u8vn AS "m3u8vn", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_server( id, name, url, ipaddress, addtine, edittime, slock, servertype, status, rtmpsd, rtmpnd, rtmphd, rtmpvn, m3u8sd, m3u8nd, m3u8hd, m3u8vn, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( default, #{name}, #{url}, #{ipaddress}, #{addtine}, #{edittime}, #{slock}, #{servertype}, #{status}, #{rtmpsd}, #{rtmpnd}, #{rtmphd}, #{rtmpvn}, #{m3u8sd}, #{m3u8nd}, #{m3u8hd}, #{m3u8vn}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
